verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> my rock, <S%H6697><s%> Who trains <S%H3925><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> for war, <S%H7128><s%> [And] my fingers <S%H676><s%> for battle; <S%H4421><s%>

My lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and my fortress, <S%H4686><s%> My stronghold <S%H4869><s%> and my deliverer; <S%H6403><s%> My shield <S%H4043><s%> and He in whom I take <S%H2620><s%> refuge; <S%H2620><s%> Who subdues <S%H7286><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> me.

O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is man, <S%H120><s%> that Thou dost take <S%H3045><s%> knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of him? Or the son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H582><s%> that Thou dost think <S%H2803><s%> of him?
Man <S%H120><s%> is like <S%H1819><s%> a mere <S%H1892><s%> breath; <S%H1892><s%> His days <S%H3117><s%> are like a passing <S%H5674><s%> shadow. <S%H6738><s%>
Bow <S%H5186><s%> Thy heavens, <S%H8064><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and come <S%H3381><s%> down; <S%H3381><s%> Touch <S%H5060><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> that they may smoke. <S%H6225><s%>
Flash <S%H1299><s%> forth <S%H1299><s%> lightning <S%H1300><s%> and scatter <S%H6327><s%> them; Send <S%H7971><s%> out Thine arrows <S%H2671><s%> and confuse <S%H2000><s%> them.

Stretch <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> from on high; <S%H4791><s%> Rescue <S%H6475><s%> me and deliver <S%H5337><s%> me out of great <S%H7227><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> Out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of aliens <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%>

Whose <S%H834><s%> mouths <S%H6310><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> deceit, <S%H7723><s%> And whose right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> is a right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of falsehood. <S%H8267><s%>

I will sing <S%H7891><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> to Thee, O God; <S%H430><s%> Upon a harp <S%H5035><s%> of ten <S%H6218><s%> strings <S%H6218><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Thee,

Who dost give <S%H5414><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%> to kings; <S%H4428><s%> Who dost rescue <S%H6475><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> His servant <S%H5650><s%> from the evil <S%H7451><s%> sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Rescue <S%H6475><s%> me, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> me out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of aliens, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> Whose <S%H834><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> deceit, <S%H7723><s%> And whose right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> is a right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of falsehood. <S%H8267><s%>

Let our sons <S%H1121><s%> in their youth <S%H5271><s%> be as grown-up plants, <S%H5195><s%> And our daughters <S%H1323><s%> as corner <S%H2106><s%> pillars fashioned <S%H2404><s%> as for a palace; <S%H1964><s%>

[Let] our garners <S%H4200><s%> be full, <S%H4392><s%> furnishing <S%H6329><s%> every <S%H2177><s%> kind <S%H2177><s%> of produce, [And] our flocks <S%H6629><s%> bring <S%H503><s%> forth <S%H503><s%> thousands <S%H505><s%> and ten <S%H9539><s%> thousands <S%H9539><s%> in our fields; <S%H2351><s%>

[Let] our cattle <S%H9017><s%> bear, <S%H5445><s%> Without <S%H369><s%> mishap <S%H6556><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> loss, <S%H3318><s%> [Let there be] no <S%H369><s%> outcry <S%H6682><s%> in our streets! <S%H7339><s%>

How blessed <S%H835><s%> are the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H7945><s%> are so <S%H3602><s%> situated; How blessed <S%H835><s%> are the people <S%H5971><s%> whose <S%H7945><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is the Lord! <S%H3068><s%>
